Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster, titled "The Charm of the Venue: 'The China National Pavilion'” (场馆魅力之“中国国家馆”), shows the China Pavilion, also known as the "Oriental Crown" (东方之冠 ) and the provincial sections within the structure. These include sections for Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan.The poster was sponsored by the China Zheshang Bank (浙商银行).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
